localize.title: Buzzing on Reddit
localize.description: See what's buzzing on Reddit in your native language

blogPost.excerpt: We have 30 seconds of screen time during Super Bowl LVI. We want to give as many people as we can the chance to be on TV. Everyone who participates gets to send in a quick video, and we’ll play them all on TV during the Super Bowl.
blogPost.body: We have 30 seconds of screen time during Super Bowl LVI. We want to give as many people as we can the chance to be on TV. Everyone who participates gets to send in a quick video, and we’ll play them all on TV during the Super Bowl.
blogPost.title: Super Super Bowl Ad - We’ve got a Super Bowl 2022 ad and we are giving it to you
blogPost.author: Daniel Greenberg

localize.description: 在超级碗LVI期间，我们有30秒的屏幕时间。我们想给尽可能多的人上电视的机会。每个参与的人都可以发送一个快速的视频，我们将在超级碗期间在电视上播放它们。
localize.tagline: 我们有一个2022年超级碗的广告，我们把它送给你。

localize.description: 在超級碗LVI期間，我們有30秒的屏幕時間。我們想給儘可能多的人上電視的機會。每個參與的人都可以發送一個快速的視頻，我們將在超級碗期間在電視上播放它們。
localize.tagline: 我們有一個2022年超級碗的廣告，我們把它送給你。

localize.description: 📈HireBeat for Employers是一个自动面试筛选平台，为雇主节省时间🕗和金钱💰! HireBeat提供单向面试邀请，让雇主随时随地审查和评估候选人的表现。
